metadata.notes: Card 112 rewritten to avoid disallowed incest content.

cards.prompt: What small thing contributes more to your happiness than people would expect?
What would you refuse to give up even if you were offered $1 million?
What part of your life have you still not figured out?
What do you think you’ll regret not doing when you’re on your deathbed?
When have you been your own worst enemy?
What have you learned about life from loss or death?
Who deserves more recognition in your life than you've given them?
What have you done from a place of insecurity that has had long-lasting effects?
Which teacher had the biggest impact on you, and why?
Where in your life do you feel misunderstood?
If you could meet your younger self, what advice would you give them?
What's a sign that a friendship will last forever?
Do you believe in fate? If so, name an experience that has validated it.
Who was the coolest kid in your high school, and what are they doing now?
If you could instantly learn three new skills, what would they be?
In the story of your life, which chapters would you want your parents to skip?
Describe a time you had to end a friendship and why.
What flaws would you be okay with in a romantic partner?
What was your favorite date that we’ve ever had?
Fill in the blank: “When I am angry, I tend to ____.”
What is the easiest way to break your trust?
How well do you think you’d get along with someone exactly like you?
Who do you think would thank you in their award speech one day?
How would you change the way society punishes criminals?
If every person came with a warning label, what would yours say?
If your daily routine became a reality show, which parts would be the most talked about?
What do you think detectives would assume about you if they inspected your room without meeting you?
When was the last time you laughed uncontrollably?
If you were invisible for a week, how would you spend your time?
Who’s one influential figure you wish you could make a hundred clones of?
As a child, how did you imagine adulthood, and how does that compare to your life now?
Who is the last person you’d want to be stuck in an elevator with?
Have you ever felt differently about someone after dreaming about them?
What’s something about your life now that you think you’ll miss when you’re eighty?
What’s something you could do five years ago that you can’t do now?
If you had to come up with a new class that everyone is required to take in school, what would it be?
If you could change one thing about your upbringing, what would it be?
If everyone had to decide their career path at age six, what would your life look like now?
Describe a moment that made you feel like a real grown-up.
What new Olympic sport would you definitely win a medal in?
What is one thing your exes probably miss about you?
If a crystal ball could tell you one truth, what would you ask?
Imagine we all had to start over on Mars and you chose who gets into Humanity 2.0. How would you decide?
What is a character trait you hope you never pass on to your kids?
Which superpowers do you think would be more inconvenient than useful?
Do you believe chemistry is inherent, or can it be developed over time?
What is a weird belief you used to have as a kid?
What’s the one thing that should be taught in school but isn’t?
If you could be born in another era, which would you choose?
In what ways are you privileged?
What’s a common trait shared by everyone you’ve dated?
What is one underrated quality you find attractive in a person?
When was the last time someone saw you cry?
What would you do in life if money wasn’t an issue?
When you sit next to someone on a plane, what do you imagine is going through their mind?
If all your exes got together, what’s one complaint they would all agree on?
Among your friends, who do you find sexually exciting?
What would you like to be forgiven for around sex?
When it comes to sex, my mother gave me the sense that…
When it comes to sex, my father gave me the sense that…
What I wish I could change about you and sex is…
What sexually hardcore activity would you pick if you had to?
Which famous person would you want to sleep with?
With time, how would you want your sex life to change?
What curses or obscenities have a hidden erotic charge for you?
Describe a typical fantasy you might masturbate to.
If you could wave a magic wand, what would you want more of in your sex life?
What part of your body do you worry might put a lover off?
If you had to start a porn site, what would it be devoted to?
Is the problem with infidelity that it hurts the other person, or is it bad in itself?
To get me more in the mood for sex, it would help if…
If I were redesigning human sexuality and biology, I would…
Sex for me feels too dangerous when…
Society muddles us about sex because…
What supporters of 1960s sexual liberation misunderstood is…
What do you think people hide about sex?
We are often turned on by people in fantasy who are very different from us. Discuss.
Something I’m really inhibited about is…
If we decided not to have intercourse but still wanted to do something sexual, what might we do?
Describe something you would hate to do for real, but find kinky to think about.
What you really need to understand about me and sex is…
If you could have sex with a complete stranger, what might they be like?
What might I do in ordinary life that would turn you off later in bed? What might turn you on?
What were some of your earliest sexual thoughts?
What part of your body do you think is most attractive?
What mistakes have you made around sex?
Try to guess where a major sexual interest of yours comes from.
If I were close to orgasm, what would you do to push me over the edge?
Imagine a couple who have really got sex right. What have they managed to do?
I’m a bit difficult about sex because…
How was your sexuality shaped by your family?
If I were taking an erotic photograph of you, I would ask you to…
If we lived in a very repressed society, full of prohibitions, what might be a particular turn-on?
I’d like you to believe that my love for you could be compatible with…
In what way do you feel ashamed or guilty around sex?
How are you afraid of letting your partner down sexually?
What slightly unusual location would you want to have sex in, and why does it excite you?
If I told you who I really was around sex, you might…
Name a way your partner could change that would help sex go better.
What can suddenly turn me off? What can suddenly turn me on?
What technical aspect of sex do you find tricky?
What I wish I could change about me and sex is…
In what ways do you feel underappreciated sexually?
In the context of sex, how would you redesign the institution of marriage?
What gets harder about sex the better you know someone?
In what way might someone describe you as “bad in bed”?
Would you rather degrade or be degraded? What might you do or say?
The borderline illegal thing I find most attractive is…
If sex is more in the mind than the body, what’s a sexy ideal for you?
If you had to leave your current orientation and have a one-off encounter, what would you want your lover to be like?
If you had to pick a taboo relationship dynamic to explore only in fiction, what would it be and why?
Who do you rather regret sleeping with?
What kind of clothes turn you on?
What could you almost be tempted to give your partner permission to do outside of “us”?
What makes you nervous about sex is…
What kind of power dynamics excite you?
What do you enjoy doing the most with me?
If this was to be our last conversation, what would you want me to never forget?
Have you ever felt jealous of me?
Have I ever made you feel humiliated?
What part of me do you find difficult to deal with?
What’s the one thing you wish you hadn’t said to me?
What is an apology I still owe you?
What is one experience with me you wish you never had?
Describe a time when I made you feel unloved.
Have I ever made you feel like you were not important to me?
Have you ever felt lonely around me?
Is there a hurtful thing I’ve said that still lingers in your head?
What is one thing I say or do that makes you feel unheard?
What should I do more to support your growth?
What do you admire about me?
What is one thing you want me to do more for our relationship?
What is one thing you wish I’d said to you but never did?
What do you want me to give you or say to you more often?
What is one thing you want me to change?
What do you want me to open up more to you about?
What do you want to receive more from me?
Is there anything you wish I was better at?
What is the pain in you that you wish you could heal?
What’s the hardest thing for us right now?
What’s one thing you still don’t understand about me?
If everything happened for a reason, why do you think we met?
If you could bring me back to your childhood with you, when and where would it be?
If one day we went separate ways, what memory would you want me to take with me?
If you could give me anything in the world, what would it be and why?
If we went separate ways, what is the one thing you would miss most about us?
If this were our last conversation, how would you want me to remember us?
What do I mean to you?
Was there a time when you didn’t want me in your life anymore?
Describe a time when you needed me, but I wasn’t there.
Have you ever felt like losing yourself in our relationship?
What do you think I’m struggling with the most right now?
How would your life be different if we had never met?
If you could go back in time, what is something about us you would do or say differently?
How would losing me make you feel?
Which parts of you have you sacrificed for our relationship?
What’s your biggest fear for our relationship?
Describe your favorite memory that we share.
What do you think I fear the most?
What is the last thing I did that surprised you?
How do you see me changing in our relationship?
How have I changed you?
When were you most worried about me?
When did you feel closest to me?
Describe a time when I made you proud.
What is a wish you have for me?
Do you get enough compliments from me?
What do you think is attractive about me that I don’t see in myself?
What are you learning from me?
What about our relationship makes you really happy?
What is one thing you’re afraid to ask me?
What is a gift someone gave you that you will never forget?
If you could be famous for one thing, what would it be?
What was the best moment of your day today?
What is a small thing that other people do that always means a lot to you?
What’s something you spend a surprising amount of time thinking about?
What kind of person do you hope the people in your life see you as?
What is something you often wish people understood about you?
If you did not worry about consequences or other people’s opinions, what is something you would do?
What is something you think you will keep getting better at for the rest of your life?
What is a small decision you made that changed your life in a big way?
What is something you are pretty sure you could never get tired of?
What is something that took you a long time to learn or understand?
If money were no concern, what would you want to do with your life?
What is a personal goal you are currently working toward?
What is something you find embarrassing?
Which memory stands out as your happiest?
If you could reconnect with one person from your past, who would it be and why?
What food or song always brings back good memories for you?
Who is someone you look up to, and what do you admire about them?
What is something you are in the process of outgrowing?
What is a recent moment when you felt deeply happy?
What is a decision you once made that you would make differently today?
Who in your life has had a bigger impact on you than they probably realize?
What is the most meaningful compliment anyone has ever given you?
What is a side of you that you only show to people you are close with?
What is a habit or routine you would like to start?
What is the strongest feeling you have right now?
What is something you lost or misplaced that you still think about?
What is a conversation or encounter with a stranger that you will never forget?
What is something you want and are also a bit afraid of?
What is a message you wish you could send to someone?
What is something you feel hopeful about?
What is something you are learning to like, or to be more okay with?
How would you describe what you believe your life’s purpose is?
What’s a question you wish you could get an answer for?
What life situation has helped build your strength or resilience?
What’s a belief that has personal meaning to you?
What is a common quality in people you really like?
If you could ask your future self a question, what would it be?
If you could make one wish come true for someone else, what would it be?
What’s something that always makes you feel a little brighter?
Looking back, what’s something you’re surprised you did, chose, tried, or became?
If you could let go of something right now, what would it be?
What’s something you’ve worked really hard on recently?
What’s something you dislike that most people like?
What do you think your 8-year-old self would think about who you are today?
What moment of your life do you wish you could live again?
What’s something people assume about you when they first meet you?
If you could be an instant success at something new, what would it be?
What’s one thing about yourself you’re genuinely proud of?
When you imagine your happy place, where is it and what are you doing?
What’s something that’s more challenging for you than for most people you know?
What is the most romantic gesture you have ever made for someone?
In what ways do you feel you most resemble your parents?
What is one habit you wish you could break?
What is the most childlike thing you still find yourself doing?
As a child, what did you imagine you would be when you grew up?
When did you last tell a lie that no one discovered?
What in your life are you most grateful for right now?
If you wrote your life story, what would you call it?
What is one thing most people would be surprised to learn about you?
What is another thing about you that almost nobody knows?
Five years from now, what do you hope your life looks like?
If your life had a soundtrack, which songs would be on it?
Where do you feel most safe, and what makes that place feel that way?
What is your favourite sound or smell, and what does it remind you of?
When was the most recent time you went out of your way to help a stranger?
When have you felt truly heartbroken, and what happened?
What happened in your most recent romantic encounter?
How would you describe your first great love?
What is a time you went into something expecting it to fail but did it anyway, and what happened?
When did you last sing to yourself, and when did you last sing to someone else?
Which achievement are you most proud of, and why?
If you were stranded on a deserted island, which three foods would you choose to have with you?
What is something you genuinely like about the person you are with right now?
What are three things you seem to have in common with the person next to you?
What is something you have wanted to do for a long time, and what has held you back?
What has been the high point of your life so far, and what made it so special?
What is a time you were unkind to someone who did not deserve it, and what happened?
What would your ideal date look like from start to finish?
In what ways do you most like to receive love, and how do you prefer to show it?
Which people, living or dead, would you most like to invite to a dinner?
Whose life do you think would be most shaken by your death?
Which three people have shaped who you are today the most?
What has been the lowest point in your life so far, and what was happening then?
How would you like people to describe you at your funeral?
Do you believe anything happens after we die? Why or why not?
In a few minutes, how would you tell the story of your life so far?
How do you define forgiveness in your own words?
What is the single most important decision you have made in your life?
If you could set one rule for everyone on Earth to follow, what would it be, and why?
How do you typically respond when you are in pain, physically or emotionally?
Whose death would impact you the most, and why?
When was the last time you genuinely feared you might die?
If you died tonight, what unspoken thing would you most regret not having said, and to whom?
What does inner freedom look like to you in practice?
If you could pick any superpower, which one would you choose and what would you do with it?
If your name were remembered far into the future, what would you want it to be associated with?
What is one small thing you have been wanting more of from me lately?
When I go quiet or pull back, how does that affect you, and what helps you most in those moments?
Would it feel good to have a regular time just to talk and listen, and what would make that feel safe for you?
Have you felt any change in how close we are, and if so, how would you describe it?
Is there anything you miss about how we used to feel together, and if so, what stands out most?
Does physical affection feel supportive for you right now, and if so, what kind feels best?
Would you like to try something new together soon, and if so, what is one small thing that sounds good?
Are there any memories of us that feel especially good to you, and if so, which one comes to mind first?
